alert.note: Alert for Northern Orange; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 3:10AM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures 22 to 25 expected. * WHERE...Northern Orange and Southern Orange Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
